pokerapp.utils

Class Constants

  • Object
    • Constants

  • public class Constants
extends Object
    This class is intended to hold constants required elsewhere in the app and eradicate magic numbers. TODO:Probably better to have more than one class, each containing constants used by a group of classes performing a related function. In any case at least we get to use the Singleton (anti) pattern.
